sentences.en: He had been the golden boy of Welsh rugby.
sentences.cn: 他曾是威尔士橄榄球界的骄子.

sentences.en: He wants actors who can speak Welsh. Obviously I've had it.
sentences.cn: 他要的是会说威尔士语的演员。明摆着，我是没指望了。

sentences.en: He welshed on his agreement with the team that he would play for them in February.
sentences.cn: 他逃避履行他与球队合同中在二月为他们踢球的协议。

sentences.en: He went to the beautiful old Welsh dresser that graced this homely room.
sentences.cn: 他走到为这间舒适的房间增色不少的漂亮的旧威尔士碗橱前。

sentences.en: Her voice had a soft Welsh lilt to it.
sentences.cn: 她讲话的声音柔和而抑扬顿挫，有些威尔士口音。

sentences.en: I never welch on my bets.
In both Welsh and Irish the word for "moon" is of feminine gender.
sentences.cn: 在威尔士语和爱尔兰语中，表示“月亮”的词是阴性的。
在现代威尔士语中，glas意为“蓝色”。

sentences.en: Since the Sixties, afforestation has changed the Welsh countryside.
sentences.cn: 60年代以来，植树造林已经改变了威尔士的乡村面貌。

sentences.en: Some Welsh activists have started blacking out English language road signs.
sentences.cn: 一些威尔士激进分子已经开始涂盖英语路标。

sentences.en: Stephen ventured a few more sentences in halting Welsh.
sentences.cn: 在阻止韦尔什时，斯蒂芬壮着胆子多说了几句。

sentences.en: The Welsh are no slouches at cooking.
sentences.cn: 威尔士人在烹饪方面可是好手。

sentences.en: The western-most part of north Wales is a stronghold of Welsh-speakers.
sentences.cn: 北威尔士最西部是说威尔士语人的聚居区。

sentences.en: They're all Welsh settlers in France.
sentences.cn: 他们都是移居法国的威尔士人.

sentences.en: Welsh international Matthew Postle was third fastest at the halfway point.
sentences.cn: 到半程时，威尔士的世界级选手马修·波斯特尔位居第三。

words.tran_cn: 赖帐，赖赌债逃走；逃避责任

trans.tran_cn: 不付赌金而溜掉，逃避履行义务，逃避（责任等），对（某人）食言
trans.tran_en: If someone welshes on a deal or an agreement, they do not do the things they promised to do as part of that deal or agreement
